gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.util

Class StatusLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwind.avlist.AVListImpl
      • gov.nasa.worldwind.WWObjectImpl
        • gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.AbstractLayer
          • gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.util.StatusLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AVList, Disposable, MessageListener, PositionListener, RenderingListener, Layer, Restorable, WWObject, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StatusLayer.StatusMGRSLayer, StatusLayer.StatusUTMLayer

    public class StatusLayer
extends AbstractLayer
implements PositionListener, RenderingListener
    Renders statusbar information as a layer.

    Used ScalebarLayer and StatusBar as template
